project.name: ADK Knowledge - Knowledge System
project.description:
Knowledge system including Graph, RAG, Memory, and Wiki.
This module contains four sub-systems with distinct responsibilities: - graph/ : Code Graph (AST parsing, code navigation, impact analysis) - depends on JavaParser - rag/ : Vector Retrieval (embedding, chunking, similarity search) - depends on Embedding API - memory/ : Long-term Memory (project insights, task history, error patterns) - wiki/ : Documentation Generation (auto-generated project wiki)
Architecture Note: Each sub-system has its own SPI interface defined in the api/ package (GraphService, RagService, MemoryService, WikiService). KnowledgeService acts as a unified facade. These sub-systems are candidates for future module extraction (adk-graph, adk-rag, adk-memory) when the codebase grows and independent versioning is needed.
